name: Destroyer: The U-Boat Hunter Supporter Bundle
name_original: Destroyer: The U-Boat Hunter Supporter Bundle
description:
Contains the game Destroyer: The U-Boat Hunter and the Supporter Pack DLC

The supporter pack contains a selection of goodies for Destroyer: The U-Boat Hunter, for all those who want to go the extra mile to support the developer of the game.Included now:
  • The complete Destroyer soundtrack
  • HD video collection with technical and historical background info
  • In-game Destroyer skins
  • 3D object art gallery
  • Concept art gallery
  • Art book / Strategy guide

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your support!
